snippet: From the moment he dropped out of Harvard, Mark Zuckerberg has remain remarkably focused on Facebook -- and on arranging the ownership of the company to give himself extraordinary power to control it, reports Somini Sengupta in The New York Times on...
abstract: From the moment he dropped out of Harvard, Mark Zuckerberg has remain remarkably focused on Facebook -- and on arranging the ownership of the company to give himself extraordinary power to control it, reports Somini Sengupta in The New York Times on Friday.

headline.main: Daily Report: The Boss of Facebook
